Posts.Content: lynned wrote: Hi all ive been waiting for my results for nearly 2 weeks now and was due to go for a follow up appointment tomorrow but breast nurse phoned asking if it was ok to change appointment to friday instead lol i said no chance i need my results ive waited too long for them she said my results are nothing to worry about but i will still need to discuss the findings so i dont mind changing my appointment now i know its not bad news i will update on friday when i go for my follow up xxx Log in to post a reply
